action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering over the email from "isseki".
action.program_description: Email client displaying two email threads.
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an email client with two email threads. The first email thread is from "isseki" and asks "What should I do?". The second email thread is from "Fujitsu" and requests to reschedule a meeting from 2024-11-17 16:00~17:00 to 17:00~18:00.
